title: Aquarium Manager
description: A dashboard for management and tracking of home aquarium upkeep tasks.
documentation:
# Aquarium Manager

## Overview
Aquarium Manager is a simple application for the tracking of aquarium upkeep tasks.

## Features
- **Aquarium Dashboard**: Centered aquarium image with inhabitant gallery
- **Inhabitant Profiles**: Track fish and other inhabitants with name, species and photo
- **Activity Logging**: Log feedings, water changes, cleanings, filter maintenance and custom activity types
- **Reminders**: Set reminder periods for each activity so overdue tasks are highlighted
- **Equipment Inventory**: Track aquarium equipment with label, count, description, date of first use and in-use status

## Technical Implementation
- State management using React hooks
- Local storage for data persistence via Dexie.js / IndexedDB
- Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Radix UI dialog components for modals
